description:
Like A Stray Dog
Bunji has met Taiga, who is five years older than him, and whom he hasn`t seen for a while. He was heavily influenced by his bad boy behavior. A stray dog lies around and he says that if it gets tamed, it`s over, but...
Dotted Handkerchief
Fumi has a favorite dotted handkerchief. There`s a jinx that if she carries it around, she will get along with anyone. Carrying that, she was about to confess her love to an upperclassman, but when she sees one of her classmates is going to be transferred to another school...
Big Collaboration
Bunji is supposed make an art piece in a group using paper mache. But everyone wants to make their own — a fire truck, a dinosaur, a castle — and what they want to make don`t match, so they each started to make on their own...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Like a Stray Dog / Dotted Hankerchief / Big Collaboration / Mini Festival
野良犬みたいに / ドットのハンカチ / 大合作 / ミニ縁日
